arts.ttl: Video: Inter star Lautaro Martinez equals Maradona’s goal tally for Argentina
arts.sum: Inter star Lautaro Martinez scored a spectacular goal for Argentina against Peru last night, equalling...

arts.ttl: Messi reaches new record in Argentina win
arts.sum: Lionel Messi is celebrating reaching a new record after his role in Argentina’s 1-0 win over Peru. Messi set up Lautaro Martinez’s winner for the world champions as Argentina extended their lead at the top of the table in South America’s 2026 World Cup qualification phase. Argentina are now five points clear at the […] The post Messi reaches new record in Argentina win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Martinez matches Maradona; Brazil booed after draw
arts.sum: World Cup winning captain Messi had a quiet game, but played a pivotal role in the goal 10 minutes into the second half. Lautaro Martinez moved level with Diego Maradona in Argentina's scoring charts as the World Cup winners beat Peru 1-0.

arts.ttl: Messi sets up Martinez golazo in Argentina win
arts.sum: Argentina striker Lautaro Martinez scored in the second half to secure a 1-0 home win against Peru in South American qualifiers for the 2026 World Cup on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Argentina beats Peru to close in on World Cup spot from South American qualifying
arts.sum: Lautaro Martínez’s goal gave Argentina a 1-0 win over Peru on Tuesday in a South American World Cup qualifying match in Buenos Aires. Argentina leads South American qualifying with 25 points from 12 matches.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi Ties Landon Donovan Record in Argentina's Win Over Peru
arts.sum: Lionel Messi is on the brink of breaking yet another record after his most recent performance for Argentina.

arts.ttl: What is the retro adidas kit worn by Argentina against Peru?
arts.sum: The first of Argentina’s three World Cup triumphs came in 1978, wearing the iconic adidas trefoil logo. To mark the occasion, Argentina will wear an eye-catching retro-inspired kit for Tuesday’s game against Peru .

arts.ttl: Adidas Argentina 50 Years Kit Font Released
arts.sum: A few days after the kit and just in time for the debut, the Adidas Argentina 50 Years kit font was finally released, allowing fans to complete the retro look of the jersey.

arts.ttl: Will Leo Messi play for Argentina in World Cup qualifying game vs Peru tonight?
arts.sum: Will Messi play against Peru in the World Cup Qualifiers? The 12th matchday of the CONMEBOL World Cup qualifying stage sees table topping Argentina host struggling Peru at La Bombonera in Buenos Aires.
